name: Arm Circles
instructions: Circle arms forward and backward to mobilize the shoulder joints.

name: Shoulder Rolls
instructions: Roll shoulders forward and backward in a circular motion.

name: Dynamic Side Lunges
instructions: Step side to side in a lunge motion to warm up hips and groin.

name: Cat-Cow Stretch
instructions: Alternate between arching and rounding your back on all fours.

name: High Knees
instructions: Jog in place, lifting knees as high as possible.

name: Butt Kicks
instructions: Jog in place, kicking heels toward glutes.

name: Torso Twists
instructions: Stand tall and rotate your torso left and right.

name: Standing Leg Swings
instructions: Swing one leg front to back and side to side to mobilize the hips.

name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: Jump legs out and raise arms overhead, then return to start.

name: Arm Swings Across Chest
instructions: Swing arms horizontally across chest to stretch the shoulders.

name: Bird Dog Hip Circles
instructions: On all fours, circle one leg in a big motion to mobilize the hip.

name: Inchworm Walkout
instructions: From standing, walk hands out to plank and back to standing.

name: Worldâ€™s Greatest Stretch (Low Lunge Torso Twist)
instructions: Step into a low lunge, reach and twist torso toward front leg.

name: Ankle Bounces
instructions: Quickly hop on the balls of the feet to warm up the calves and ankles.

name: Squat to Stand (Hamstring Forward Fold)
instructions: Deep squat, then fold forward to stretch the hamstrings and lower back.

name: Wrist Rolls
instructions: Rotate wrists gently in circular motions.

name: Neck Rolls
instructions: Gently roll neck in a circular motion.

name: Elbow Circles
instructions: Circle elbows to loosen and warm up the joint.

name: Walking Lunges
instructions: Lunge forward alternating legs to warm up the lower body.

name: Full Extension to Toe Touches
instructions: Reach arms overhead, then bend down to touch toes, repeat dynamically.

name: Dumbbell Front Raise
instructions: Stand upright with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Raise the dumbbells in front of you to shoulder height with straight arms. Lower slowly. Do not use momentum.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Keeping your arms straight, lift the dumbbells out to your sides until they reach shoulder height. Pause and lower slowly.

name: Dumbbell Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back flat. Hold dumbbells below shoulders, then raise your arms wide to the sides. Squeeze shoulder blades together. Lower slowly.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Start seated with dumbbells in front of shoulders, palms facing you. As you press overhead, rotate palms to face forward. Reverse on the way down.

name: Upright Row
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells in front of thighs. Pull the dumbbells up along your body to chest height, keeping elbows higher than wrists. Lower slowly.

name: Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing forward. Press the dumbbells overhead until arms are straight, then lower with control.

name: Incline Bench Y-Raise
instructions: Lie chest-down on an incline bench, arms hanging. With light dumbbells, raise arms overhead in a 'Y' shape, keeping thumbs up. Lower slowly.

name: Dumbbell Around the World
instructions: Lie on your back on a bench holding dumbbells at thighs. Sweep arms out and up in a wide circle to overhead, then back down.

name: Dumbbell Clean and Press
instructions: Hold dumbbells at your sides. Dip slightly, then explosively pull dumbbells to shoulders (clean), then press overhead. Lower and repeat.

name: Prone Y Raise on Incline
instructions: Lie chest-down on an incline bench, arms extended overhead in a 'Y'. Raise arms upward, keeping thumbs up, pause, then lower slowly.

name: Prone T Raise on Incline
instructions: Lie chest-down on an incline bench, arms extended to sides in a 'T'. Raise arms up, squeeze shoulder blades, then lower.

name: Prone W Raise on Bench
instructions: Lie face down on a bench, arms bent like a 'W'. Squeeze shoulder blades and lift arms off the bench, then lower.

name: Face Pull with Dumbbells
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells at shoulder height. Pull elbows high and back, dumbbells toward your face. Squeeze shoulder blades together.

name: Dumbbell Scaption Shrug
instructions: Hold dumbbells at your sides. Raise arms diagonally (30Â° from front), then shrug shoulders at the top. Lower and repeat.

name: Pull-Up Hold
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar and pull up until chin is above the bar. Hold the top position as long as possible, keeping shoulders engaged.

name: Pull-Up Shrug
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar. Without bending elbows, pull shoulder blades down and together, raising your body slightly. Lower slowly.

name: DB Serratus Punch
instructions: Lie on a bench or stand. Hold dumbbells at shoulders and punch forward, protracting scapula at the top.

name: Dumbbell Uppercut Punches
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells. Punch upward in an uppercut motion, engaging serratus on each rep.

name: High Plank Protraction
instructions: From high plank, push the floor away at the top, spreading shoulder blades apart. Hold, then relax and repeat.

name: Overhead DB Hold with Protraction
instructions: Hold dumbbells overhead. At the top, reach arms further upward, protracting the scapula.

name: Tall Kneeling DB Press with Protraction
instructions: In tall kneeling, press dumbbells overhead and punch slightly upward at the top, engaging serratus.

name: Incline Bench T Raise
instructions: Lie chest down on an incline bench. Raise arms to the sides (T shape) and squeeze shoulder blades together.

name: Dumbbell Reverse Fly
instructions: Bend forward at hips, hold dumbbells. Open arms out wide, focusing on scapular squeeze.

name: Face Pull with Dumbbells
instructions: Hold dumbbells, pull toward face with elbows high, squeezing shoulder blades together.

name: Prone Row on Bench
instructions: Lie face down on a bench, row dumbbells to ribcage, pinching shoulder blades at top.

name: Bent-Over DB Row (Neutral Grip)
instructions: With a flat back, hold dumbbells, palms facing each other. Row dumbbells to hips, focusing on scapular retraction.

name: Dumbbell Row (Single Arm)
instructions: Place one hand and knee on bench, pull dumbbell to hip, keeping elbow close to body.

name: Bent-Over Row (Double Arm)
instructions: With both hands, bend at hips, row dumbbells to hips, squeezing lats at top.

name: Renegade Row
instructions: From a plank holding dumbbells, row one dumbbell at a time to hip while stabilizing core.

name: Incline Bench Row
instructions: Lie face down on incline bench, pull dumbbells to sides, focusing on squeezing lats.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
instructions: Lie on bench, hold one dumbbell with both hands, arms extended. Lower DB behind head, then pull back to start.

name: DB Bicep Curl
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells at sides, palms up. Curl up with control, then lower slowly.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other. Curl up, keeping wrists neutral.

name: Zottman Curl
instructions: Curl up palms up, rotate at top to palms down, lower slowly.

name: Alternating DB Curl
instructions: Alternate curling one dumbbell at a time, keeping elbow close to body.

name: Cross-Body Curl
instructions: Curl dumbbell across the body toward opposite shoulder, one arm at a time.

name: Overhead DB Extension (Two Arms)
instructions: Hold a dumbbell overhead with both hands. Lower behind head, then extend arms fully.

name: DB Skull Crushers
instructions: Lie on bench, dumbbells above chest. Lower toward forehead, then extend back up.

name: Close-Grip DB Press
instructions: Press dumbbells together above chest, lower slowly, keeping elbows close.

name: DB Kickbacks
instructions: Bend forward, elbow at 90Â°. Extend arm back until straight, squeeze triceps.

name: Triceps Push-Up on Bench
instructions: Place hands close together on bench, lower chest, then push up, keeping elbows in.

name: Flat DB Bench Press
instructions: Lie on flat bench, press dumbbells from chest upward, lower with control.

name: Incline DB Bench Press
instructions: Lie on incline bench, press dumbbells up, lower to chest with control.

name: DB Chest Fly
instructions: Lie on flat bench, open arms wide, then squeeze dumbbells together above chest.

name: Incline DB Fly
instructions: Lie on incline bench, open arms wide, squeeze together at the top.

name: Pullover with DB
instructions: Lie across bench, hold dumbbell with both hands, lower behind head, pull back up.

name: Around-the-World Fly
instructions: Circle arms overhead with dumbbells, maintaining control throughout motion.

name: Close-Grip DB Press
instructions: Press dumbbells together above chest, lower slowly, elbows close.

name: DB Twist
instructions: Sit upright, hold dumbbell at chest, twist torso side to side.

name: Weighted Sit-Up
instructions: Lie on back, hold dumbbell at chest or overhead, sit up and return.

name: DB Leg Raise
instructions: Lie on back, hold dumbbell overhead, raise legs up keeping core tight.

name: DB Toe Touches
instructions: Lie on back, legs straight up, reach dumbbell to toes.

name: Plank DB Drag
instructions: In plank, drag dumbbell under body with alternating hands.

name: Side Plank DB Reach Under
instructions: In side plank, reach dumbbell under body, rotate torso.

name: Weighted Dead Bug
instructions: Lie on back, dumbbells in hands, alternate lowering opposite arm and leg.

name: DB Woodchopper
instructions: Stand, hold dumbbell with both hands, rotate and lift from hip to opposite shoulder.

name: Seated DB Twist
instructions: Sit upright, feet off floor, rotate dumbbell side to side.

name: Weighted V-Up
instructions: Lie flat, hold dumbbell overhead, lift arms and legs to form 'V' at the top.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from pull-up bar, raise legs to parallel or higher.

name: Hanging Knee Raise Twist
instructions: Hang from bar, raise knees to chest and rotate knees side to side.

name: Bicycle Crunch with DB
instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, cycle legs in air, rotate torso with each rep.

name: Weighted Hollow Hold
instructions: Lie on back, dumbbell at shoulders or legs, hold hollow position.

name: Plank with Shoulder Tap
instructions: From plank, alternate tapping each shoulder with the opposite hand.

name: DB Side Bend
instructions: Stand holding dumbbell at side, bend sideways, then return upright.

name: Flutter Kicks
instructions: Lie on back, hands under hips, alternate small, quick leg lifts.

name: DB Side Crunch
instructions: Lie on side, dumbbell behind head, crunch up laterally.

name: Hip Thrust on Bench
instructions: Rest upper back on bench, feet flat, dumbbell on hips. Thrust hips up and squeeze glutes.

name: Single-Leg Hip Thrust
instructions: As hip thrust, but one foot on floor, other extended. Push through heel, squeeze glutes.

name: DB Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back, feet flat, dumbbell on hips. Lift hips up, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Frog Pump with DB
instructions: Lie on back, soles of feet together, knees open. Dumbbell on hips, pulse hips up.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Rear foot on bench, front foot forward. Lower until thigh is parallel, drive up.

name: Curtsy Lunge
instructions: Step leg behind and across, lower into lunge, keep chest tall.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand tall, knees soft. Hinge at hips, lower dumbbells along legs, return up.

name: Staggered RDL
instructions: Stand with one foot slightly behind. Hinge at hips, lower dumbbells, return up.

name: Step-Up on Bench
instructions: Step onto bench with one leg, drive through heel, bring other foot up, step down.

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Wide stance, dumbbells between legs. Hinge at hips, lower, stand up tall.

name: Clamshell with DB
instructions: Lie on side, knees bent, dumbbell on top knee. Open knees apart, keep hips steady.

name: Kneeling Donkey Kick with DB
instructions: On all fours, dumbbell behind knee, kick heel up to ceiling.

name: Fire Hydrant with DB
instructions: On all fours, dumbbell behind knee, lift knee out to side.

name: Bird Dog DB Row
instructions: On all fours, opposite arm/leg extended, perform a row with the dumbbell.

name: Hip Thrust on Bench
instructions: Rest upper back on bench, feet flat, dumbbell on hips. Thrust hips up and squeeze glutes.

name: Single-Leg Hip Thrust
instructions: As hip thrust, but one foot on floor, other extended. Push through heel, squeeze glutes.

name: DB Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back, feet flat, dumbbell on hips. Lift hips up, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Frog Pump with DB
instructions: Lie on back, soles of feet together, knees open. Dumbbell on hips, pulse hips up.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Rear foot on bench, front foot forward. Lower until thigh is parallel, drive up.

name: Staggered RDL

name: Step-Up on Bench

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Wide stance, dumbbells between legs. Hinge at hips, lower, stand up tall.

name: Clamshell with DB
instructions: Lie on side, knees bent, dumbbell on top knee. Open knees apart, keep hips steady.

name: Kneeling Donkey Kick with DB
instructions: On all fours, dumbbell behind knee, kick heel up to ceiling.

name: Fire Hydrant with DB
instructions: On all fours, dumbbell behind knee, lift knee out to side.

name: Bird Dog DB Row
instructions: On all fours, opposite arm/leg extended, perform a row with the dumbbell.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand tall, knees soft. Hinge at hips, lower dumbbells along legs, return up.

name: Stiff-Leg Deadlift
instructions: Keep knees nearly straight, hinge at hips, lower dumbbells along legs, return up.

name: Single-Leg RDL
instructions: Balance on one leg, hinge forward, lower dumbbell along standing leg, return up.

name: Glute Bridge March
instructions: From glute bridge, march legs one at a time without dropping hips.

name: Dumbbell Hip Hinge
instructions: Hinge at hips, lower dumbbells, focus on stretch, return up with control.

name: Prone Hamstring Curl
instructions: Lie face down, hold dumbbell between feet, curl legs toward glutes.

name: Standing DB Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on flat surface, raise heels off ground, lower slowly.

name: Calf Pulse Squat
instructions: Hold squat position, pulse heels up and down.

name: Childâ€™s Pose
instructions: Sit on heels, arms extended forward, relax forehead to floor.

name: Seated Forward Fold
instructions: Sit with legs extended, reach forward toward feet, keep back flat.

name: Supine Spinal Twist
instructions: Lie on back, arms out, knees bent, rotate knees side to side.

name: Cat-Cow Flow
instructions: On hands and knees, alternate arching and rounding back.

name: Downward Dog Hold
instructions: From plank, lift hips, press heels down, hold.

name: Kneeling Hip Flexor Stretch
instructions: Kneel on one knee, tuck pelvis, push hips forward for stretch.

name: Standing Quad Stretch
instructions: Stand tall, grab ankle, pull heel toward glute, balance.

name: Cross-Body Shoulder Stretch
instructions: Arm across chest, use other hand to pull arm toward body.

name: Overhead Triceps Stretch
instructions: Reach one arm overhead, bend elbow, use other hand to assist.

name: Neck Side Stretch
instructions: Sit or stand tall, gently pull head to side with opposite hand.
